common.title: XDownloaderz | X (twitter) Video Downloader
common.description: Download X (Twitter) videos for free, fast, and securely. Supports 1080p Full HD quality and MP3 conversion. Works on all devices.

social.ogTitle: XDownloaderz | Download X (twitter) Videos Fast & Convert & Free | HD .mp4/.mp3
social.ogDescription: The best X (twitter) Video Downloader. Save videos and GIFs in full HD quality. Convert X (twitter) videos to MP3. Free, fast, and no registration required.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do?
whatWeDo.p1: XDownloaderz is a powerful and free web tool designed to bridge the gap between social media feeds and your personal devices. We offer a seamless way to download videos and media from X (formerly Twitter) directly to your computer, tablet, or smartphone.
whatWeDo.p2: Unlike other services requiring software installation or registration, our tool runs entirely in your browser using advanced web technologies. It finds the highest available resolution up to 1080p Full HD and offers instant media format conversion options.

step1.title: 1. Paste
step1.desc: Copy the link of the X (Twitter) post containing the video you want to download and paste it into our search box.

step2.title: 2. Analyze
step2.desc: Our smart engine communicates with the platform's public infrastructure to find the video file and available quality options (e.g., 720p, 1080p).

step3.title: 3. Download
step3.desc: Select your preferred quality, and the file is saved directly to your device without being stored on our servers.

items.title: No Registration:
items.desc: We respect your time and privacy. You don't need to create an account or provide an email address to use our features.

items.title: High Quality:
items.desc: We prioritize finding the highest bitrate (quality) available for every video.

items.title: Client-Side Processing:
items.desc: We use modern browser capabilities (including FFmpeg technology) to process videos efficiently, ensuring fast downloads without compromising security.

items.title: 100% Free:
items.desc: Our tool is completely free for everyone.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.heading: We Value Your Feedback
contact.description: You can email us to report a broken download, submit a copyright notice, or just say hello.
contact.footerSuffix: page to learn more about our project.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: At XDownloaderz ("we", "us"), we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how your information is handled when you use our web-based tool for downloading media from X (formerly Twitter).
intro.p2: By using our service, you agree that you have read and understood this policy.

personal.title: 1. Personal Information
personal.desc: Our service operates on a non-retention basis. We do NOT collect, store, or share any "Personally Identifiable Information" (PII) such as:
personal.note: You do not need to register or log in to use our service.

usage.title: 2. Usage Data and Log Files
usage.desc: Like most standard web servers, we use log files. These files may contain data such as internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, platform type, date/time stamp, and click counts. This information is used to analyze trends, administer the site, and track user movements in aggregate. This data is not linked to any information that is personally identifiable.

urls.title: 3. URLs and Media Content
urls.desc: When you paste a link (URL) into our search bar, that link is processed temporarily by our servers solely for the purpose of locating the relevant media file. We do not keep a permanent history of the links you submit.

local.title: 1. Mandatory Local Storage
local.desc: We use your browser's Local Storage features solely to remember your interface preferences (e.g., Dark/Light mode selection).

analytics.title: 2. Third-Party Analytics
analytics.desc: We use Google Analytics to monitor and analyze the use of our Service. This helps us improve our user experience. Google Analytics collects data anonymously.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.desc: Our service works by accessing public data on X (Twitter). When you download a video, you are accessing content hosted on third-party servers. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of the platforms you interact with.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.desc: Since we do not collect personal data and do not track individual users, we are fully compliant with the "data minimization" principles under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via our website or our

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the XDownloaderz website, you agree to the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.

sections.title: 2. Disclaimer
sections.content: XDownloaderz is NOT affiliated with, associated with, authorized by, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with X Corp. (formerly Twitter), or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. The official X website can be found at twitter.com or x.com. The names "X", "Twitter" as well as related names, marks, emblems and images are registered trademarks of their respective owners.

sections.title: 4. Prohibited Activities
sections.subcontent: You agree not to use the Service for:
list: Distributing copyrighted material without permission or for commercial gain.
Uploading or transmitting viruses or malicious code.
Attempting to overload, spam, or crash our servers.

sections.title: 5. "As Is" and Limitation of Liability
sections.content:
The Service is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE". We do not guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or completely secure.

XDownloaderz shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages, including but not limited to data loss or copyright disputes, arising from the use or inability to use the Service.

sections.title: 6. Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Your continued use of the website after changes are made means you agree to the new Terms of Service.

sections.title: 7. Analytics
sections.content: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage data. By using our service, you agree to this data collection as described in our Privacy Policy.

items.title: User Responsibility
items.desc: You acknowledge that XDownloaderz is a technical tool that allows downloading only publicly available media. We do not claim ownership of any content downloaded through our service.

items.title: Copyright Compliance
items.desc: You agree to use this service only for content you have the right to download or for personal use (Fair Use). You may not use this tool to infringe on the copyrights of others.

items.title: Content Rights
items.desc: All intellectual property rights related to videos, images, and audio belong to their respective content creators and the hosting platform.

staticPosts.content:
‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

üîí Can I download videos from private/locked accounts?

No. XDownloaderz can only download videos from public X (Twitter) posts. Content on private accounts is protected by the X (Twitter) API and cannot be accessed.

üí° Solution: You can ask the content owner for permission.

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

üìπ Why isn't the 1080p option always visible?

Some X (Twitter) videos may have been uploaded only in 720p or lower quality. XDownloaderz cannot produce a higher resolution than the original video quality.

The highest available quality option will be presented to you.

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

üéµ How does MP3 conversion work?

When downloading an X (Twitter) video, XDownloaderz automatically extracts the audio track and converts it to MP3 format. This process happens in your browser and is completely secure.

‚è±Ô∏è Conversion time may take 5-30 seconds depending on video length.

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

üõ°Ô∏è Is XDownloaderz safe? Will I get a virus?

Yes, it is 100% safe. XDownloaderz does not host any files, and contains no adware or viruses. Videos are downloaded directly from X (Twitter) CDN servers.

‚úÖ Works with SSL (HTTPS) encryption in your browser.
‚úÖ Your personal information is never collected.

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

üí∞ Is XDownloaderz free? Is a subscription required?

No! XDownloaderz is completely free and will stay that way forever. There are no fees, hidden costs, or subscription systems.

üéÅ You can download unlimited videos and use it as much as you want.

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

‚öñÔ∏è Is it legal to use downloaded videos?

You can use downloaded content for personal, educational, or fair use purposes. However:

‚ùå Republishing for commercial purposes
‚ùå Committing copyright infringement
‚ùå Sharing without the content owner's permission

Acting in accordance with the law is the user's responsibility.

üöÄ Fastest Download: Save X (Twitter) videos in seconds
üéØ Easy to Use: Download videos in just 3 steps
üíé High Quality: 1080p Full HD support
